This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
Using PHPUnit, creates a test file from an existing package source class and places it in the package tests directory.
docblock.long-description:
Usage is ...

 $ php package/Aura.Framework/cli/make-test {$FILE}

... where $FILE is a package file path, e.g. package/Vendor.Package/src/Vendor/Package/Class.php.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.
Provides a public interface to web assets for a package.
docblock.long-description:
Your package should be set up like this:

 Vendor.Package/
     config/
     scripts/
     src/
     tests/
     web/
         images/
         scripts/
         styles/
             foo.css

You can then use the URL /asset/Vendor.Package/styles/foo.css to access the package asset, even though it's not in the web document root.

Additionally, you can cache the assets to the web document root, so that they are served statically instead of through PHP.

docblock.description: The Aura config modes in which we should cache web assets.
The subdirectory inside the web document root where we should cache web assets.
Sets the config modes in which caching should take place.
Sets the subdirectory in the web document root where web assets should be cached.
Given a package name and an asset file name, delivers the asset (and caches it if the config mode is correct).
